data.title: Obituary for William Warren Chandler Jr.
meta_keywords: funeral home in Virginia Beach VA
data.meta_description: Obituary for William Chandler Jr. | Virginia Beach, VA | William Warren Chandler, Jr. was born on July 9, 1944...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for William Warren Chandler Jr. | Beach Funeral & Cremation Services, Inc.
data.text:
William Warren Chandler, Jr. was born on July 9, 1944 in Williamston, NC to the late William and Mary Louise Chandler.

William was a graduate of Princess Anne County Training School. He enlisted in the United States Navy and received an honorable discharge. To further his career as a Master Electrician, William enlisted in the United States Airforce and also was honorably discharged.

William met and married the love of his life, Juliette Hayes, whom they bore and cherished their one and only son, Anthony D. Chandler.

Besides his parents, William was predeceased by his wife, Juliette Hayes Chandler and son, Anthony D. Chandler.

William leaves to cherish his fond memories, two brothers, Charles Thomas Chandler (Cathy), Linwood Earl Chandler; three sisters, Janice Aloyce Chandler, Beverly Chandler-Granger (John), Lillian Odell Chamberlain (Anthony); and a host of nieces, nephews and friends.

We will greatly miss our dear “Billy” and his loving, kind spirit.
